name: Once In The Mountains
description:
Do we know everything about the world we live in? This is the first game in the series that will tell us how much we are wrong.

A short story that will start a great series of stories about what we do not notice in our world.

After passing, you will not be able to live as before.

*The game is currently under development, currently version 0.9. sounds and music will soon be added to the game, as well as minor bugs fixed.
